languages.text: Истекая слюной, ласераксы провожают взглядом исчезающие в глотках пирующих яства — и, судя по торчащим ребрам, недоедают они уже давно.
Salivating profusely, the laceraxes watch the food disappear into people's throats — judging by their protruding ribs, the beasts have not been properly fed in some time.
languages.original_text: Истекая слюной, ласераксы провожают взглядом исчезающие в глотках пирующих яства — и, судя по торчащим ребрам, недоедают они уже давно.

languages.text: ラセラックスは、よだれをぼたぼたと垂らしながら、人々の喉に消えていく食べ物を見つめている。突き出たあばら骨を見るに、この獣たちはしばらくまともに餌を与えてもらっていないようだった。
languages.original_text: Salivating profusely, the laceraxes watch the food disappear into people's throats — judging by their protruding ribs, the beasts have not been properly fed in some time.

traits.locale_text: ラセラックスは、よだれをぼたぼたと垂らしながら、人々の喉に消えていく食べ物を見つめている。突き出たあばら骨を見るに、この獣たちはしばらくまともに餌を与えてもらっていないようだった。

languages.text: Die Laceraxe produzieren viel Spucke, als sie sehen, wie das Essen in den Hälsen der Leute verschwindet – ihren hervorstehenden Rippen nach zu urteilen, wurden die Tiere schon länger nicht ordentlich gefüttert.
languages.original_text: Salivating profusely, the laceraxes watch the food disappear into people's throats — judging by their protruding ribs, the beasts have not been properly fed in some time.

traits.locale_text: Die Laceraxe produzieren viel Spucke, als sie sehen, wie das Essen in den Hälsen der Leute verschwindet – ihren hervorstehenden Rippen nach zu urteilen, wurden die Tiere schon länger nicht ordentlich gefüttert.

languages.text: Los lacerax salivan abundantemente mientras observan cómo la comida se esfuma por las bocas de la gente. A juzgar por su costillar visible, estas bestias llevan tiempo sin comer debidamente.
languages.original_text: Salivating profusely, the laceraxes watch the food disappear into people's throats — judging by their protruding ribs, the beasts have not been properly fed in some time.

traits.locale_text: Los lacerax salivan abundantemente mientras observan cómo la comida se esfuma por las bocas de la gente. A juzgar por su costillar visible, estas bestias llevan tiempo sin comer debidamente.

languages.text: 这群异虎流着口水，看着食物消失在人们的嘴巴里。从它们突起的肋骨判断，这群异虎已经相当一段时间没饱餐过了。
languages.original_text: Salivating profusely, the laceraxes watch the food disappear into people's throats — judging by their protruding ribs, the beasts have not been properly fed in some time.

traits.locale_text: 这群异虎流着口水，看着食物消失在人们的嘴巴里。从它们突起的肋骨判断，这群异虎已经相当一段时间没饱餐过了。

languages.text: Laserakslar, ağızları sulanmış bir şekilde yemekleri boğazlarına indiren insanları izliyor. Belirgin kaburgalarına bakılacak olursa uzun bir süredir doğru düzgün beslenmemişler.
languages.original_text: Salivating profusely, the laceraxes watch the food disappear into people's throats — judging by their protruding ribs, the beasts have not been properly fed in some time.

traits.locale_text: Laserakslar, ağızları sulanmış bir şekilde yemekleri boğazlarına indiren insanları izliyorlar. Belirgin kaburgalarına bakılacak olursa uzun bir süredir doğru düzgün beslenmemişler.

languages.text: Bavant abondamment, les lacérax observent la nourriture disparaître dans les gosiers. Leurs côtes saillantes laissent penser qu'ils n'ont pas été convenablement nourris depuis un certain temps.
languages.original_text: Salivating profusely, the laceraxes watch the food disappear into people's throats — judging by their protruding ribs, the beasts have not been properly fed in some time.

traits.locale_text: Bavant abondamment, les lacérax observent la nourriture disparaître dans les gosiers. Leurs côtes saillantes laissent penser qu'ils n'ont pas été convenablement nourris depuis un certain temps.
